author: daxian-dbw
body: Add Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive to PowerShell repo. This work is part of #1031

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: You probably want 387be202fd6797e454fbb62eefff0322b05ef0f4 committed as PowerShellTeam.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Right, forgot it again. Will update it.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Should we do it?
We have a separate repo with it https://github.com/PowerShell/Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @vors Good catch. If not, would it be easy to include this module as part of PowerShell release?

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
@daxian-dbw it would be easy: we have [LICENSE](https://github.com/PowerShell/Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive/blob/master/LICENSE) already so no LCA work, just engineering. And you just did it here :)

Lets hold on and keep the branch around for now.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @daxian-dbw @vors we already have this mapping into `src/Modules`, the shared modules.

title: Add Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive to build
